metadata.title: CVE-2013-6408 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The DocumentAnalysisRequestHandler in Apache Solr before 4.3.1 does notproperly use the EmptyEntityResolver, which allows remote attackers to havean unspecified impact via XML data containing an external entitydeclaration in conjunction with an entity reference, related to an XMLExternal Entity (XXE) issue. NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of anincomplete fix for CVE-2013-6407.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-6408` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblucene3-contrib-java - 3.6.2+dfsg-8
liblucene3-java - 3.6.2+dfsg-8
libsolr-java - 3.6.2+dfsg-8
solr-common - 3.6.2+dfsg-8
solr-jetty - 3.6.2+dfsg-8
solr-tomcat - 3.6.2+dfsg-8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lucene-solr package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.2+dfsg-8').
